title: How to unsubscribe from [ADD_SERVICE] Doctor Online
description: This guide provides instructions on how to cancel your [ADD_SERVICE] Doctor Online subscription. Cancellation policies vary, so it's important to review the terms of service on the official website.

steps_1.title: Cancel Your Doctor Online Subscription via Website
steps_1.description:
To cancel your Doctor Online subscription, follow these steps:

*   Go to the official Doctor Online website.
*   Look for the "Terms of Service," "Cancellation Policy," or "FAQ" section.
*   Find the specific instructions for canceling your subscription.
*   Check if any notice period is required before cancellation.
*   Determine if you are eligible for a refund based on the cancellation policy.
*   Cancel your subscription through the patient portal, if available.
*   Contact customer service if online cancellation is not an option.

seo_text: Learn how to cancel your [ADD_SERVICE] Doctor Online subscription. This guide provides step-by-step instructions and information on cancellation policies, refund eligibility, and contact information for customer service. Find out how to manage your telehealth subscription and avoid unwanted charges.
